client_ready: Are you ready to request a ride?
name: Name
account_typ_select: What type of account would you like to create?
check_email: Check your email and paste the code in the field below and create a new password.
request_pw_par: Forgotten your password?  Enter the email address you created your account with and press the button below. An email with a password reset code will be emailed to you.
no_jobs: Right now we are not seeing any jobs this list updates every 10 seconds. Internet connection is required for this list to update.
job_instructions: This list updates every 10 seconds. New jobs will appear and job taken by other rides will be removed.
go_to_client: Travel to the client marker on the map to pick up your customer.
mark_ride_comp_inst: Once you have taken your client to the destination mark the job complete. The destination is used to calculate your stats.
rider_old_job_alert: This is an old job. Remember to complete the old jobs before taking a new one.
customer_old_job_warn: This is an old request. Remember You must close old requests before making a new one.
ride_instructions: Enter any special instructions or directions.
gps_warning: You must have GPS enabled to use this feature. Remember riders close to you can see your location on a map.
